Gluten free option available 14.95 $ *Steakhouse Saut√©ed mushrooms, bleu cheese crumbles, Mark & Jerry‚Äôs most excellent steak sauce 15.95 $ *Southern BBQ sauce, applewood smoked bacon, cheddar cheese 15.95 $ All Burgers Served with French Fries Add the following to any burger for an additional charge Applewood Smoked Bacon 1.50 $ Fried Egg 1 $ Served with french fries Sandwiches Market Street Chicken & Shrimp Grilled chicken breast, baby shrimp, chipotle pepper sauce 14.95 $ *Tbonz Texas Melt Blackened prime rib, sliced turkey, applewood smoked bacon, Monterey Jack cheese, lettuce, tomato, au jus 16.95 $ Philly Cheesesteak Thinly sliced sirloin steak, grilled onions, white American cheese 16.95 $ Big Fish Sandwich Lightly fried, American cheese, applewood smoked bacon, lettuce, tomato, onion, Old Bay tartar sauce 16.95 $ Liberty Club Grilled chicken, applewood smoked bacon, lettuce, tomato, sundried tomato basil pesto, Monterey Jack, wheatberry bread. Gluten free option available 22.95 $ Fish & Chips Beer battered cod, Old Bay tartar sauce, French fries, southern slaw 19.95 $ Baby Back Ribs Southern slaw, French fries Half Rack 20.95 $ Half Rack 30.95 $ Served with freshly baked bread, house salad or caesar salad and a choice of one side Gill & Grill Combos *10oz Dry Rub Sirloin with Crab & Shrimp Florentine Topped with shrimp, crab & spinach cream sauce 26.95 $ *12oz Ribeye & Coconut Shrimp Ribeye, sweet Thai duck sauce 34.95 $ Served with freshly baked bread, house salad or Caesar salad and a choice of one side Signature Steak Board Steak Cuts *10oz Dry Rub Sirloin 23.95 $ *8oz Filet Mignon 32.95 $ *12oz Ribeye 29.95 $ *12oz Drunken Ribeye 31.95 $ *18oz Tbone 32.95 $ *12oz Prime Rib Friday - Sunday, while available 31.95 $ Accompaniments Saut√©ed Mushrooms & Onions 4 $ Bleu Cheese Crust 4 $ Grilled or Fried Jumbo Shrimp 8 $ Coconut Shrimp 8 $ Steak Temperature Rare - cool red center Medium Rare - warm red center Medium - warm pink center Medium Well - slightly pink center Well Done - little to no pink Sides Rice Pilaf 5.95 $ Southern Slaw Gluten free option available 5.95 $ Yukon Mashed Potatoes Gluten free option available 5.95 $ Idaho Baked Potato Gluten free option available 5.95 $ French Fries 5.95 $ Seasonal Vegetable Gluten free option available 5.95 $ Flash Fried Brussels Sprouts 5.95 $ Sweet Potato Gluten free option available 5.95 $ Yellow Stone Ground Cheddar Grits 5.95 $ Warm Bread Loaf Served with House Made Maple Butter 2.95 $ Gluten Free option available - These items can be altered to be gluten friendly TBonz is not a gluten free environment. Our menu items are handcrafted in our kitchens, oftentimes using shared equipment (including common fryers) and variations in vendor-supplied ingredients may occur. For these reasons, we cannot assure you that any menu item will be entirely gluten free.
*These items contain raw or undercooked ingredients. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish and eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness, especially if you have a medical condition. A possible health risk may exist in eating undercooked ground beef at an internal temperature less than 155 degrees. Immediate consumer or purchaser must be 18 years of age or older and notified in advance.
